verses.roman:
nirveda ha-ila pathe, karena vicāra
'nīca-jāti, deha mora--atyanta asāra

synonyms: nirveda ha-ila—there was disappointment; pathe—on the path; karena vicāra—he considered; nīca-jāti—of a lower caste; deha mora—my body; atyanta—completely; asāra—useless for devotional service.
translation: In disappointment, Sanātana Gosvāmī considered, "I am of a low caste, and my body is useless for devotional service.
